OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

Usage.label: Usage
Usage.tooltip: Usage for where the script can be used!

OnCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

OnUserCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

Protected.label: Caster cannot lose
Protected.tooltip: If enabled viewers can't rob from the broadcaster

Blacklist.label: Blacklisted User
Blacklist.tooltip: List Users that can not be robbed. Seperated with comma.

BlacklistResponse.value: {0} you can not rob {1}. User is blacklisted.
BlacklistResponse.label: Blacklist response
BlacklistResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when the target is on blacklist 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = target

Timeout.label: Timeout users who fail
Timeout.tooltip: If enabled viewers that tries to rob and fail will get timed out. Only available for Twitch

TL.label: Timeout length
TL.tooltip: Length for the timeout if users fail to rob

WinResponse.label: Win response
WinResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user wins 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = value won 
 {2} = Currency name 
 {3} = target

LoseResponse.value: {0} tried to rob some {1} from {2} but {0} got rekt and {2} managed to rob {3} {1} from {0} instead!
LoseResponse.label: Lose response
LoseResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user fails to defuse the bomb 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = currencyname 
 {2} = target 
 {3} = amount of currency stolen

InfoResponse.value: {0} you have to chose a target to try to rob from
InfoResponse.label: Info response
InfoResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't choose a target. 
{0} = user

NotEnoughResponse.value: {0} you don't have enough {1} to attempt this! You will need atleast {2} {1}.
NotEnoughResponse.label: Not enough currency response
NotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have enough points 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Currencyname 
 {2} = min Amount

TargetNotEnoughResponse.value: {0} the target {1} has not enough {2} to attempt this!
TargetNotEnoughResponse.label: Target not enough currency response
TargetNotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when target doesn't have enough points 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = target 
 {2} = Currencyname

PermissionResponse.value: {0} -> only {1} ({2}) and higher can use this command
PermissionResponse.label: Permission denied response
PermissionResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't select any valid wire. 
{0} = user 
{1} = permission
{2} = permission info

NotHereResponse.value: {0} you can only rob from users who are currently in the viewerlist!
NotHereResponse.label: Bad target
NotHereResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't select a user that's currently in the viewerlist. 
 {0} = user

SelfRobResponse.label: Self target
SelfRobResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user wants to rob himself #facepalm. 
 {0} = user

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!
